Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class plMatrixDataDescriptor< T >

This class implements a data descriptor for STL data matrices with possibly missing values.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename T >
plMatrixDataDescriptor< T >::plMatrixDataDescriptor ( const std::vector< std::vector< T > > *  data,
const std::vector< std::vector< bool > > *  def = 0 
)
inlineexplicit

Constructor using a pointer to an STL matrix without associating it to a set of variables.

The actual association to a set of variables could be done later by calling set_variables().

Parameters
[in]dataa pointer to the STL data matrix to be used.
[in]defa pointer to the STL data definition matrix. 0 is complete data (no missing values).
template<typename T >
plMatrixDataDescriptor< T >::plMatrixDataDescriptor ( const plVariablesConjunction &  variables,
const std::vector< std::vector< T > > *  data,
const std::vector< std::vector< bool > > *  def = 0 
)
inline

Constructor using a pointer to an STL matrix.

Parameters
[in]variablesThe variables associated to the descriptor.
[in]dataA pointer to the STL data matrix to be used.
[in]defA pointer to the STL data definition matrix. 0 is complete data (no missing values).

References plVariablesConjunction::dim(), and plMatrixDataDescriptor< T >::set_variables().

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T >
bool plMatrixDataDescriptor< T >::get_data_record ( const plValues *&  data_values,
const std::vector< bool > *&  data_definition 
)
inlinevirtual

Get the next data record (row) and advances by one record in the data.

Parameters
[out]data_valuesan array of values for all variables described in the record.
[out]data_definitiona vector stating, for each value in data_values, whether it's defined or not.
Returns
false iif the end of the container is reached.

The returned pointers are managed internally: you should not attempt to delete them, or use them after another call to get_data_record(). Also, you should not use them when get_data_record() returns false.

Implements plDataDescriptor.

template<typename T >
void plMatrixDataDescriptor< T >::set_variables ( const plVariablesConjunction &  variables)
inline

Set the variables to be associated to the data descriptor.

This method is to be called when the descriptor is constructed without providing the variables list. After this call, observed_variables() will return the passed 'variables' parameter.

Parameters
[in]variablesThe variables to be associated to the data descriptor

References plVariablesConjunction::dim(), and plMatrixDataDescriptor< T >::get_num_fields().

Referenced by plMatrixDataDescriptor< T >::plMatrixDataDescriptor().
